metadata.title: CVE-2024-45619 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in OpenSC, OpenSC tools, PKCS#11 module,minidriver, and CTK. An attacker could use a crafted USB Device or SmartCard, which would present the system with a specially crafted response toAPDUs. When buffers are partially filled with data, initialized parts ofthe buffer can be incorrectly accessed.

criterions.comment: opensc package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
